'''Windblume Kamera''' is an Event Gadget obtained during the {{Quest|Breezy Snapshots}}. It is used in the [[Windblume's Breath/Breezy Snapshots|Breezy Snapshots]] subevent.

It presents no special functions that differentiate it from the [[Kamera]] gadget.
